channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Shanghai Artificial Intelligence Laboratory on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: GSDF: 3DGS Meets SDF for Improved Neural Rendering and Reconstruction
item.description: GSDF: A novel dual-branch neural scene representation elegantly resolves the rendering-reconstruction trade-off by synergistically combining 3D Gaussian Splatting and Signed Distance Fields via mutual…

item.title: InternLM-XComposer2-4KHD: A Pioneering Large Vision-Language Model Handling Resolutions from 336 Pixels to 4K HD
item.description: InternLM-XComposer2-4KHD pioneers high-resolution image understanding in LVLMs, scaling processing from 336 pixels to 4K HD and beyond, achieving state-of-the-art results on multiple benchmarks.

item.title: MindMerger: Efficiently Boosting LLM Reasoning in non-English Languages
item.description: MindMerger efficiently boosts LLM reasoning in non-English languages by merging LLMs with external multilingual language understanding capabilities, achieving significant accuracy improvements, especi…

item.title: ProSST: Protein Language Modeling with Quantized Structure and Disentangled Attention
item.description: ProSST, a novel protein language model, integrates protein sequences and structures using quantized structure representation and disentangled attention, achieving state-of-the-art performance in zero-…

item.title: Training-Free Adaptive Diffusion with Bounded Difference Approximation Strategy
item.description: AdaptiveDiffusion accelerates diffusion model inference by adaptively skipping noise prediction steps, achieving 2-5x speedup without quality loss.

item.title: Weak-to-Strong Search: Align Large Language Models via Searching over Small Language Models
item.description: Align LLMs efficiently via test-time search using smaller models!
